definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: In Japan, they appear to have been ruptured by explosions of escaping hydrogen.
sentences.chinese: 在日本，這種安全殼被逃逸的氫氣產生的爆炸擊碎。

sentences.english: Tokyo Electric Power, for its part, planned to vent some of the radioactive steam from inside the containment building.
sentences.chinese: 東京電力計劃從安全殼廠房中釋放部分發射性蒸汽。

sentences.english: Installing containment filtrate exhaust system (EUF) to prevent the containment failed on over-pressure.
sentences.chinese: 增設安全殼過濾排氣系統防止安全殼晚期超壓失效。

sentences.english: Installing containment filtrate exhaust system (EUF) to prevent the containment failed on over-pressure.
sentences.chinese: 增設安全殼過濾排氣系統防止安全殼晚期超壓失效。

sentences.english: The Soviet-built plant did not have containment vessels surrounding its obsolete style of reactors.
sentences.chinese: 蘇聯自建廠房沒有圍繞其過時的風格反應堆安全殼船。
